title: net/http/pprof: document blocking profile needs some configuration
body: The [net/http/pprof docs](https://golang.org/pkg/net/http/pprof/) list running `go tool pprof http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/block` to get a blocking profile but should mention you need to call [runtime.SetBlockProfileRate](https://golang.org/pkg/runtime/#SetBlockProfileRate) somewhere in your program.
